v.text_: You seem like you wish to leave.
Just having a bit of fun.
Y'know, as a youth, I was\nquite the gunman myself.
Folks used to say I was\neven better'n a machine\nsoldier! *hic*
My husband said a\nstrange man shot at\nhim in the woods.
Fortunately, he didn't\npursue, but still, it's\nleft us shaken.
Several bounty hunters\nhave been fallin' under\nattack lately.
You're a bounty hunter,\ntoo, yeah? You take care\nout there.
Today, I'm gonna hunt for\nour food all by myself!
(The light fades... This is the wrong way.)
Hey! HEY! One of the\nfailures has escaped!
Hey! HEY! One of the\nfailures has escaped!
HEE HEE HEE.\nWHAT FUN. WHAT FUN.
HEE HEE! KILL!! KILL!\nI WANT TO KIIIIIILL!
"What's your name?" he asks.\n"Why are you here?"

n.text_: The throne room is this\nway. We must hurry!

v.text_: That boy is from\nthe royal family!
We're not pawns for\nyour damn war!
I must hurry to my training.
"Hurry home, Dad.\nMom and me are waiting for you!"
All of her husband's favorite drinks are here.
The fire is always ready for her husband's return.
It's made with thick material for the biting cold.
I can't wait for Dad\nto come home.
Then I can give him\nthe gloves I made!
I'm certain he will\nlove them, dear.
Welcome. It took you a little while to get here, didn't it?
This is the last memory; the last tale.
This memory differs from all the rest.
The world within is terribly unstable.
Stay close to Mama so you don't get lost, all right?
Monsters like you live in this world.
It's quite unlike the human world, don't you think?
Oh! Look at that over there.
Those are monsters—creatures of the same type as you.
They certainly seem to be having fun!\nI wonder what they're talking about?
You want it? Come get it!
If I just keep going, then one day...
The dark foes will attack you here as well, I'm afraid.
They seem to be chattering about all the
As you dream eaters devour said dreams,\nyou will change.
Eventually, you will take on a human form.
You all want to be human, don't you?
That was your wish, wasn't it?
They seem to be chattering about all the\ndreams they've taken from humans.
Eventually, you will take on a human form.
Was your wish too, wasn't it?
The pain you feel right now?
It will only grow deeper as we restore this memory.
We are moving ever closer to the deepest parts of this memory.
And as we do, you grow nearer to your original self.
Be careful that you don't get swallowed up.
Old selves have a way of doing that...
Oh dear. Do stay alert, now.
I recognize this method of killing.
It means they have intruded nearby.
This one is going to destroy your memory.
Your wish won't come true if you don’t\nrestore this, you know?
I can't become human like this!
There are two contradictory beings within your memory
One is a monster that wishes to become human.
The other is a monster that rejects this thought.
You, I am afraid, were stuck in the middle.
What do you truly wish to do?
Our only path is straight ahead, after all.
It is difficult for any creature to fight their instincts.
The wish to become human...\nThe urge to eat dreams...
Those are the greatest desires for monsters such as you.
They are your very reasons for living.
Denying them would be the same as denying yourself.
You wanted to be human, yeah?
Why are you letting it bother you now?
They will intrude on your hesitation.
Once they read your thoughts, they say them out loud.
Then they creep into your memory while you're shaken\nand attempt to destroy it.
You devoured all of her dreams whole.
Then you took her body and became human.
The restoration is almost complete.\nBrace yourself.
You need to face your sins.
That girl is the one from\nwhom you stole dreams.
You stole her body.\nYou became human.
And that is the form you take now:\nthe sinful girl in black.
Yes, something came from all this
you fulfilled your\ndesires as a monster.
But the poor girl, with\nall her dreams taken away...
Her form became that of\nyour own true self.
A body so warped that she\ncannot even return to her\nown world.
Well, you simply couldn't live with that.
You were going to be friends.
Her dreams were taken from her.
So she took on the form of\nthe monster in your place...
and still wanders The Cage even now.
You have righted all the\nmemories you were meant to fix.
Now you will take back\nyour final fragment.
And with that, you will\nanswer my question again.
The time has come to\nfulfill your wish.
Go on, Son. Pick out\nyour birthday gift.
H-hey, no running!\nHeh. He'll never learn.
You have no freedom.\nRemember this always.
Now ready yourselves\nfor the next battle.
Report to the feeding\nhall on the eighth\nfloor for nourishment.
Prisoner codes A–H:Go\nto the transport room.
Report to the feeding\nhall on the eighth\nfloor for nourishment.
Flowers have been\nsighted in Area AL-18.
This isn't good.\nWe have to go, now!
Why are you two not\nfollowing orders?
Would you like to hear a\nsecret before you die?
The organization doesn't\nknow what it's doing!
I don't want to be\ncast aside because\nI think for myself!
We may not be under\ntheir thumb anymore,\nbut we can still fight.
You've seen first-hand\nhow the organization\ntreats defectives.
What happened after the\ncommander stabbed you?
Well then, it's about\ntime we go say hello.
We'll all be killed if\nwe keep this up.
We don't want to fight!\nStop this! Wake up!
It's time to put our plan\ninto action.
Isn't that a laugh?\nIf anyone's messed up,\nit's the organization.
You wanted revenge after\nyour son was killed,\ndidn't you?
Let's blend in with the\nreturning soldiers and\nenter the base.
Die so that your husband can live.
Die together so your husband\nwon't have to live without you.
I'm glad I got to...\nspend my life with you...
Data saved as reference for\nfuture clone development.
There's no need to look\nso worried, dear!
Go hide in the closet,\nokay, dear?
Get the boy out of here!\nHurry!
I'm here to teach ya\na lesson, so I am...
I'm here to teach ya\na lesson, so I am...
I understand how you feel,\nbut I cannot. I'm sorry.
Hey! Pipsqueak! Where do\nya think YOU'RE goin'!?
Ain't no captain around\nto help ya now! Haw haw!
I'm here to relieve you.\nIt's my turn on patrol.
I came to apologize for\nwhat happened earlier.
Nice to see ya finally\nlearned some manners.
Just do what I say and\nwe won't have trouble.
This idiot drank my\nbeer last night!
I SCHAID I was schorry!\nWhaddya want from me!?
Sooo, I kinda forgot the\ndetails of today's operation?
You're the one in charge\nof preparation!
All right. I'll head back\nand get ready for the\noperation.
Captain, that problem\nchild from yesterday\nis unaccounted for.
Yeah, we're all sick of you.\nAny chance you can just\ngo off and die somewhere?
Let's all calm down, okay?\nI'll go buy some more later.
It's all right. I'll take care\nof getting everything ready.
Alpha Team, proceed to\nPoint B as planned.
Alpha Team, we'll soon\narrive at Point D.
Charlie Team, scout\nthe enemy numbers\nfrom the west.
We'll prepare there\nand await further\nsituation reports.
Alpha Team, fall back\nonce you've destroyed\nthe enemy armory.
Beta Team, move prisoners\nto the camp. Charlie Team,\nreturn to base.
―Repeat: Error in dormant state of specimen.
Accommodation of specimen no longer possible.\nAwakening processes activated.
"Blood exchange complete. Line breaker severed.\nSea of Origin discharge...complete."
Specimen beginning to awaken.\nAll vital signs normal.
Particle removal complete. Opening accommodation chamber.\nAll nearby staff members are advised to keep their distance.

<align="center">- Dear Noelle, -</align>

Happy birthday!
Here's to many more.
                                                   Love,
                                                   Elenore

<align="center">- Halting of Production and Project Suspension -</align>

As of tomorrow (June 8), the cloning-oriented weaponry 
mass-production project we have worked on thus far will 
cease any and all activity following the manufacture of sister 
unit 123 and the project itself will be shelved.

I will share the reasons for this decision later on, but allow me
to say here and now that I assume full responsibility.

<align="center">- Memory-Degradation Phenomenon Experiment Report -</align>

Specimens: 31, 33, 34, 35

Procedure: Specimen 31 was shown a paper with an image 
of a blue square before being euthanized. The remaining 
three specimens were made to recover 31's memories from 
her body at staggered intervals afterward, at which point they 
were asked about the shape and color of the image on the 
paper.

<style="Dash">――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――</style>

Situation A: One Day Post-Death (Specimen: 33)
Response: <hint>Specimen 33 answered "square,"</hint> then later 
added, "blue."

Situation B: Two Days Post-Death (Specimen: 34)
Response: <hint>Specimen 34 answered "square,"</hint> then added, 
"gray."

Situation C: Four Days Post-Death (Specimen: 35)
Response: <hint>Specimen 35 answered "I don't know."</hint>

<align="center">- Forgotten Letter: About the Gate's Passcode -</align>
(This missive is written on paper for security reasons. Please 
dispose of it after reading,)

You may have heard news of this already, but specimen 
0—the original—will be granted permission to visit the 
cultivation labs, so we need to revise our security protocols 
with that in mind. I went ahead and changed the passcode, 
and I decided to make it related to the <hint>memory-degradation 
experiment report</hint>. All you need to do is <hint>input the shapes 
in specimens 35, 34, and 33's responses in that exact order</hint>. 
That's right, <hint>it's the opposite order they come in compared 
to the report itself</hint>, so make special note of that. Oh, and 
<hint>input "×" for "I don't know."</hint>

<align="center">- Beautifully Handwritten Message on Memo Paper -</align>

As anticipated, only a portion of the living-weapon 
production records can be printed using a spare key card. 
I'll need to go get the key card I forgot in the extraction room 
tomorrow. Luckily, I'm still able to print the part that has 
<hint>specimen numbers, which start with "#"</hint>, which should be 
enough to figure out the passcode to the extraction room. 
All you need to remember is to look for <hint>the even-numbered 
specimen that died</hint>. <hint>Input the corresponding specimen 
number into the elevator</hint> and you're good to go.

<align="center">- Living-Weapon Manufacturing Record MRA5:20 -</align>

...ERROR: Lack of authorization to access the requested file.
...Commencing partial print of the document.

#0115: Used in an experiment. Receiving adjustments.
#<hint>0116</hint>: Sent to the ■■■■. Currently investigating 
connection to the above specimen*.
#0117: Died in combat.
#0118: Put into operation. Alive.
#0119: Memory anchoring failed. Dismantled.
#0120: Put into operation. Receiving treatment for injuries.
#0121: Currently being examined as part of the ■■ that 
happened to specimen 123.
*As with ■■, specimen 116's corpse was liquefied, making 
analysis difficult.

<align="center">- Scrap of a Torn Note -</align>

I have made a terrible mistake. I've had everything all wrong 
from the very beginning. I thought this was just another facet 
of all the weapons research that was going on at the time.

There is no longer much that I can do, but I must fulfill my 
duty all the same.

I must show her the truth.

<align="center">- Scrap of a Torn Note -</align>

We came upon an abandoned research facility during today's 
investigation. Judging by the documents that were left 
behind, my guess is the place was used for researching 
genetics and living organisms.

It would be remiss of me not to mention one object that was 
of particular note—a fully functioning cryogenic sleep 
chamber with "Eleanor" engraved on the side.

After the higher-ups make their final call on how to address 
the matter tomorrow, we will perform a thorough investigation 
of the chamber's interior. I hope against hope that this 
discovery will mean great things for our future and for all of 
mankind.

<align="center">- Torn Piece of Paper -</align>

Wh—
I only...

And that's why I                this body. No que
However... Still human               And yet, sadly,
we were powerless to do anything.

This era—and we who inhabit it—have little time left. I am 
ashamed to ask of you such a selfish request, but with it 
done, the girl will finally be able to live her own life. I beg 
of you... Please help her.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　D.U
